- Run out of ink : The game is a black and white game with only 2 source of other color

Category:
PC

Tips:

Bonhomme 7 Heures (The Boogey Man) is a prototype for a concept of a survival horror game where you have to find objects in order to destroy the Boogey Man before he can get to you in the night time
Tips:

- You have to escape the Boogey Man's path without him catching you

- You can use closets, walls. rooms and such to escape his sight and not get caught while he roams the house, but don't stay too long! Otherwise you will start to go insane and loose your vision.
- Your goal is to disable the clock in the living room to stop him from being summoned and be able to sleep by finding the 3 keys to the said clock.

CONTROL:

- W-A-S-D to move around and Spacebar to jump

- E to interact and if you enter in contact with an object you can hold to grab!

NOTICE:

-If the game has some feature not working, try restarting, sometime a simple restart will bring back the features!
